titles.title: On the passing of Joseph Robinette Biden, III.
On the passing of Joseph Robinette Biden, III.

action.text: Mr. McCarthy asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Acknowledges with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the untimely death of Joseph "Beau" Robinette Biden, III, son of Vice President Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr.
